{{Quote|No-no, it was! She was in Sex Toy Story 2, Lawrence of a Labia, and I got her autograph! The guys at the comic book store aren’t gonna believe this!|The Fan}}

This man is a '''fan of [[Ursula Buffay]]'s''' pornographic career in "[[The One Where Chandler Can't Cry]]", portrayed by [[Larry Joe Campbell]].

In [[Central Perk]], he approaches [[Phoebe Buffay]], believing she is actually the porn star [[Ursula Buffay]], and asks for her autograph. After Phoebe leaves Central Perk, he briefly discusses her porn films with [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]]; leaving Joey shocked as he was unaware of Phoebe's "secret career". Though in truth, Phoebe is not a porn star but instead her sister Ursula works as one under Phoebe's name.

In the credits, Campbell is credited as "The Fan".
